page.title: 05Social Concerns
page.content: The main Edinburgh to Aberdeen railway line passes through the area as it approaches Wormit.The station in Wormit was closed in 1969 and recently a committee has been formed to assess public interest in a proposed new station at Wormit.At a public meeting in June 1985 it was stated that Fife Region is to carry out a comprehensive survey later in the year to discover who would use the station.The region hopes that it would tempt car travellers to use public transport instead.The facilities proposed at an estimated cost of Â£150 000 would cover two,six coach_length platforms,a footbridge,shelters and a car park.Tickets would be issued by an autoslot machine.
